casebody.data:
Milton Gordon WIDENHOUSE, Jr.
v.
Laura Ellen CRUMPLER. No. 247P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Laura E. Crumpler, Pro Se. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Chapel Hill, for Gordon Widenhouse.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th day of May 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."
